import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useHttp } from '../hooks/http.hooks' export const RegisterPage = () => { const {loading,request} = useHttp() const [form,setForm] = useState({ fullName:'', password: '', login: '', gender: '', diagnoses: '' }) const changeHandler = event => { setForm({...form,[event.target.name]: event.target.value}) } const registerHandler = async() =>{ try{ const data = await request('api/auth/login', 'POST', {...form}) console.log("Data:", data) } catch(e) { } } return(

Auth Page

Регистрация
) }
